doc.summary: Sends the nbt tag retrieved from <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/block/entity/BlockEntity" method="getUpdateTag" type="()net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag">BlockEntity#getUpdateTag()</ref> from the block entity at the given  position to all clients tracking the chunk.
doc.text:
Sends the nbt tag retrieved from BlockEntity#getUpdateTag() from the block entity at the given position to all clients tracking the chunk. On the client the tag is passed
to BlockEntity#handleUpdateTag(CompoundTag). Does nothing when called on the client.

doc.summary: Requests the block entity at the given position from the server.
doc.text: Requests the block entity at the given position from the server. This is automatically done when  a <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/tile/BlockEntityBase">BlockEntityBase</ref> is loaded. The server will  send an update packet as described in <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/CommonNetwork" method="updateBE" type="(net.minecraft.world.level.Level,net.minecraft.core.BlockPos)void">#updateBE(Level, BlockPos)</ref> to the client.  Does nothing when called on the server.

doc.summary: A wrapper for the network implementation of LibX.
doc.text: A wrapper for the network implementation of LibX. Allows for some networking functions that  are required very often.
